title: "Mall of the Emirates" location: "Sheikh Zayed Rd - Al Barsha 1 - Dubai" status: "Open" price: "$$$" tags: ["Dubai Gem", "Best 100"] rating: "8.74" image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/1/13/Mall_of_the_Emirates.jpg" slug: "mall-of-the-emirates"

Mall of the Emirates is a lifestyle mall usually busy and packed with international brands. Great for shopping and people-watching.
